name: Discretionary Supplement
description: The Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of Energy gained by characters with no Energy by 1 when Energy is gained.
descriptionraw: The <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114102]</color> summoned by your $[A1410] who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of $[K310] gained by characters with no $[K310] by 1 when $[K310] is gained.
descriptionreplaced: The <color=#FFFFFFFF>Jinni</color> summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> gained by characters with no <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> by 1 when <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> is gained.
